source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 600,226.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 66,880 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 4,304 to 5,260 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 5,260 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for melee combat instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
